metro.GameScreen

Class GameScreen.InGameMenuWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.GameScreen.GameScreen.InGameMenuWindow
  • Enclosing class:
    GameScreen

    public class GameScreen.InGameMenuWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the menu that'll appear when ESC is pressed during the game. It provides exit options and a settings button.
    Author:
    hauke

      GameScreen.InGameMenuWindow()
